title: P.G-H: a modern odyssey
creator_credit: I. James Wilson, John Tristram, Film Finance Corporation Australia and Juniper Films
brief_description: The life and times of the Australian born composer, Peggy Glanville-Hicks, also known as PG-H, who lived and worked in America with world renowned writers, musicians and choreographers. She became a distinguished music critic for the Hreald Tribune. Her compositions include concertos, sonatas and works for the theatre.
